lead_paragraph: ROME, Nov. 25 -- The anti-Comintern meeting in Berlin is hailed today by the Italian press as an important manifestation of European solidarity against Russia, Great Britain and the United States as the nations representing "bolshevism, plutocracy and international Jewry" and bent on asserting their hegemony at the expense of "the new European forces.
abstract: Ital press indicates USSR when conquered will be treated like Poland
snippet: ROME, Nov. 25 -- The anti-Comintern meeting in Berlin is hailed today by the Italian press as an important manifestation of European solidarity against Russia, Great Britain and the United States as the nations representing "bolshevism, plutocracy...

byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
